content.description: Operating profit margin based on last 4 quarters.

content.description: Profit after tax excluding extra-ordinary items during last 12 months.

content.description: Market Capitalization of the company at current market price.

content.description: Sales as per latest quarterly results.

content.name: Profit after tax latest quarter
content.description: Profit after Tax (excluding extraordinary items) as per latest quarterly results.

content.description: Year on year growth in quarterly profit after tax.

content.name: Price to Earning
content.description: Current Market Price to trailing 12 month's earnings (TTM PE). Earnings exclude extraordinary items.

content.name: Dividend yield
content.description: Dividend yield excluding special dividends

content.name: Price to book value
content.description: Price to book value of the stock.

content.name: Return on capital employed
content.description: EBIT / Annual Average Capital Employed\n\n        Capital Employed = Share capital + Reserves + Borrowings

content.name: Return on assets
content.description: Net profit last year on average total assets in balance sheet.

content.name: Debt to equity
content.description: Total debt of the company upon funds for equity share holders.

content.name: Return on equity
content.description: ROE: Return on average equity measures a company's profitability by revealing how much profit a company generates with the money shareholders have invested.

content.name: EPS
content.description: Earning per share during last 4 quarters.

content.name: Debt
content.description: Total borrowings as per latest annual numbers

content.description: Promoter holding as per latest shareholding filing

content.name: Change in promoter holding
content.description: Change in promoter holding versus previous quarter.

content.name: Earnings yield
content.description: Earnings yield formula as given by JG i.e. Trailing EBIT / Enterprise Value

content.name: Pledged percentage
content.description: Percentage of promoter holding pledged.

content.name: Industry PE
content.description: Industrial price to earning

content.description: Enterprise Value / EBITDA Ratio

content.name: Market Capitalization
content.description: Market Capitalization of the company at current market price.

content.name: Price to Earning
content.description: Current Market Price to trailing 12 month's earnings (TTM PE). Earnings exclude extraordinary items.

content.name: Dividend yield
content.description: Dividend yield excluding special dividends

content.name: Price to book value
content.description: Price to book value of the stock.

content.name: Return on assets
content.description: Net profit last year on average total assets in balance sheet.

content.name: Debt to equity
content.description: Total debt of the company upon funds for equity share holders.

content.name: Return on equity
content.description: ROE: Return on average equity measures a company's profitability by revealing how much profit a company generates with the money shareholders have invested.

content.name: Promoter holding
content.description: Promoter holding as per latest shareholding filing

content.name: Earnings yield
content.description: Earnings yield formula as given by JG i.e. Trailing EBIT / Enterprise Value

content.name: Pledged percentage
content.description: Percentage of promoter holding pledged.

content.name: Industry PE
content.description: Industrial price to earning

content.name: Enterprise Value
content.description: Enterprise Value is Market cap + debt - cash

content.name: Number of equity shares
content.description: Number of equity shares as per latest filing

content.name: Price to Quarterly Earning
content.description: Price upon (latest quarterly earning x 4) \n i.e. PE based only on latest quarter earning

content.name: Book value
content.description: Book value per share: (Equity Capital + Reserves) / Number of shares

content.name: Inventory turnover ratio
content.description: Inventory turnover ratio for last year.

content.name: Quick ratio
content.description: Quick ratio last year.

content.name: Exports percentage
content.description: Exports percentage of total sales last year.

content.name: Piotroski score
content.description: Companies with Piotroski score of 9 which reflects nine criteria used to determine the strength of a firm's financial position. It is based on 3 most important criteria: Profitability, Leverage and operating efficiency.

content.name: G Factor
content.description: Score out of 10. It is based on companies growth and quality of earnings. A score of 7 and above is very healthy.

content.name: Asset Turnover Ratio
content.description: Annual Sales / Average Total Assets as per balance sheet

content.name: Financial leverage
content.description: Average Total Assets as per balance sheet / Net worth

content.name: Number of Shareholders
content.description: Number of shareholders as per latest filing

content.name: Unpledged promoter holding
content.description: Percentage of unpledged promoter holding of total equity capital.

content.name: Return on invested capital
content.description: NOPAT upon invested capital (net block + working capital) ie. return from core business

content.name: Debtor days
content.description: Average trade receivables by sales per day as per the latest annual report.

content.name: Industry PBV
content.description: Industrial Price to Book Value

content.name: Credit rating
content.description: Credit rating of the company's loans.

content.name: Working Capital Days
content.description: (Working Capital - Cash) / Sales * 365

content.name: Earning Power
content.description: Basic Earning Power: EBIT / Total Assets

content.name: Graham Number
content.description: Graham number is the formula Ben Graham used to calculate the maximum price one should pay for a stock: square root of (22.5 * EPS * BV)

content.name: Cash Conversion Cycle
content.description: How quickly the company turns its inventory into sales, and its sales into cash, which is then used to pay its suppliers for goods and services

content.name: Days Payable Outstanding
content.description: Annual Trade Payables / Annual Material cost * 365

content.name: Days Receivable Outstanding
content.description: Number of days after which the payment is usually realized by the debtors

content.name: Days Inventory Outstanding
content.description: Annual Inventory / Annual Material Cost * 365

content.name: Public holding
content.description: Public shareholding excluding FII, DII and Government holding as per latest shareholding filing

content.name: FII holding
content.description: Total foreign institutional holdings as per latest shareholding filing

content.name: Change in FII holding
content.description: Change in FII holding versus previous quarter.

content.name: DII holding

Figures taken from second last annual report:

        Capital Employed: Share capital + Reserves + Borrowing
